H0.text: Atoms are the particles that ancient Greeks propose matter consists of.

H1.text: Ions are the particles that the ancient Greeks proposed matter consists of.

H2.text: Molecules are the particles that ancient Greeks proposed matter consists of.

H3.text: Ether is the particle ancient Greeks proposed that matter consists of.

A4.text: For Democritus, the only true realities are atoms and the void.
